Class TextPMTextArea

java.lang.Object

                      org.beanfabrics.swing.internal.TextPMTextArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, View<ITextPM>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BnTextArea
public class TextPMTextArea
extends javax.swing.JTextArea
implements View<ITextPM>

The TextPMTextArea is a JTextArea that is a view on an ITextPM.

Author:
Michael Karneim
